content: Apramana Bat is an optional and missable Yaoguai Chief boss fight, and can be encountered in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. First located along the North Shore of the Bitter Lake, you'll want to face it before entering the Valley of Ecstasy or you'll miss out on this fight altogether.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Apramana_Bat.md', within the main section titled 'Apramana Bat'.
The content is as follows:
Apramana Bat is an optional and missable Yaoguai Chief boss fight, and can be encountered in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. First located along the North Shore of the Bitter Lake, you'll want to face it before entering the Valley of Ecstasy or you'll miss out on this fight altogether.
